Text: Thankyou for this torrent, ive not seen this film for years, its an absolute masterpriece with brilliant acting
how is the quality on this one??

Let's see how this stacks up to the remake...

It's interesting that Michael Caine plays the opposite character in this one as opposed to the one he plays in the remake...
Remake  s u c k s. THIS is a masterpiece. Olivier in all his Olivier-ish glory. Must see.

The original version (1972) is *way* better than the remake (2007). 
Reviews:
1972: http://www.reelviews.net/php_review_template.php?identifier=705
2007: http://www.reelviews.net/php_review_template.php?identifier=531
I haven't D/Led this rip yet, so I can't comment on the quality of it.
Thanks for putting it up, WeeKnighT!
